rejection.details:
There are no national restrictions preventing adults from taking children to the playground.

The Government has published guidance on managing public outdoor settings, including playgrounds, but this does not propose limiting who is able to attend a playground: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-safer-public-places-managing-public-outdoor-settings

It is up to individual local authorities what, if any, restrictions to place on attending local playgrounds.

If your local authority is restricting who can attend playgrounds you could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
